an4.156:1.1: “Mendicants, an eon contains four uncountable periods.
an4.156:1.3: When an eon contracts, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:1.4: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:2.1: When an eon remains fully contracted, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:2.2: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:3.1: When an eon expands, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:3.2: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:4.1: When an eon remains fully expanded, it’s not easy to calculate
an4.156:4.2: how many years, how many hundreds or thousands or hundreds of thousands of years it takes.
an4.156:4.3: These are the four uncountable periods of an eon.”
